lead_paragraph: von ZUBEN--Frederick G.,died peacefully on January 7, 2016 at 77 years old with his devoted wife of 47 years, their two loving sons and his sister by his side. He is survived by his wife Antonia, his sons Christian and Max, his daughters-in-law Erin and Heather, his five grandchildren Michael, Aidan, Lucy, Phoebe and Grace, and his sister Jane Thompson. Fred was born in Hamilton, Ontario, Canada. He cherished his family and was a friend to many. He was an avid sportsman and was a Hall of Honor hockey player at Colgate University. Fred and Toni raised their sons in New Vernon, NJ and loved to spend time with family in Southold, NY and at Point Clark on Lake Huron in Ontario. The family will receive friends at the Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street in New York City on Monday, January 11 from 2-4pm and 7-9pm. Funeral services will be held Tuesday, January 12 at 11am at St. Mary's Abbey at Delbarton School, 230 Mendham Road, Morristown, NJ. Memorial donations may be made to the Parkinson's Disease Foundation at: www.pdf.org. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  VON ZUBEN, FREDERICK G.
